items.content_html: A lightweight smart contract module for whitelist-based NFT minting. Features include address management, mint limits, time windows, and optional signature verification. Built with Solidity and OpenZeppelin, optimized for easy integration and gas efficiency.
items.title: mohd-abrar-ali/whitelistMinting-core-sage: A lightweight smart contract module for whitelist-based NFT minting. Features include address management, mint limits, time windows, and optional signature verification. Built with Solidity and OpenZeppelin, optimized for easy integration and gas efficiency.

items.content_html: Subscription System Core Sage is a lightweight, modular core engine for managing subscriptions — including billing, renewals, cancellations, and plan management. Designed for flexibility and easy integration into any SaaS or recurring billing platform.

Designed for flexibility and easy integration into any SaaS or recurring billing platform.
